message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a method to improve exploration in deep reinforcement learning agents by introducing the concept of optical flow estimation from computer vision. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) as the paper uses optical flow estimation. The paper also involves the use of artificial intelligence techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely category. The paper deals with the exploration-exploitation trade-off, which is a common problem in robotics, making cs.RO (Robotics) a possible category. Finally, the paper involves deep reinforcement learning, which falls under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
